item.description:
Good news everyone! 
This months book is The Magicians by Lev Grossman. Reviews will typically compare The Magicians with the Harry Potter books as well as the Narnia series but with much more adult themes and far darker. George R. R. Martin's comparison: "The Magicians is to Harry Potter what a shot of whiskey is to a cup of weak tea." Hope you like the book!

We will be meeting at  Rodney's Bookstore on Mass Ave. There is parking around the corner on Green St. ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there! 
-Josh

 

P.S. - Have you read a good book recently that you think would make for a good discussion next month? Email it to me and it will go into the polls for August!
item.how_to_find_us: We are upstairs in Rodneys Bookstore
item.name: July Book Club Meeting
